titles.title: To amend the Higher Education Act of 1965 to establish a program that enables college-bound residents of the Northern Mariana Islands and American Samoa to have greater choices among institutions of higher education, and for other purposes.
Northern Mariana Islands and American Samoa College Access Act
Northern Mariana Islands and American Samoa College Access Act
Northern Mariana Islands and American Samoa College Access Act

action.text: Referred to the House Committee on Education and Labor.
